description: An inactive 9mm defense turret.  Up to 100 standard 9mm rounds will be automatically loaded from your inventory into the turret upon activation.  Place the turret and it will ID you as friendly with its advanced IFF software.  Consult your safety manual in the event of a malfunction.

An inactive riotcontrol turret.  Up to 50 standard 40mm less-than-lethal beanbag canisters will be automatically loaded from your inventory into the turret upon activation.  Place the turret and it will ID you as friendly with its advanced IFF software.  Consult your safety manual in the event of a malfunction.
